titleStmt.title: A godly letter sent too the fayethfull in London, Newcastell, Barwyke, and to all other within the realme off Englande, that loue the co[m]minge of oure Lorde Iesus by Ihon Knox
Admonition or warning that the faithful Christians in London, Newcastel Barwycke and others, may avoide Gods vengeaunce
titleStmt.author: Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.

publicationStmt.publisher: By J. Lambrecht? for H. Singleton] before the Castel of s. Aungel, at the signe of sainct Peter,
publicationStmt.date: In the moneth of Iuly, in the yeare of our Lord. 1554.

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; printed at Wesel by J. Lambrecht? (STC).
"A confession [and] declaratio[n] of praiers added thervnto" has separate dated title page and register.
Also published the same year as: An admonition or warning that the faithful Christians in London, Newcastel Barwycke and others, may avoide Gods vengeaunce.
Identified as STC 15073 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
